borrowUSDCForMaximumFYDai(address,bytes3.details: Borrow fyDai from Controller, sell it immediately for Dai in a pool, and sell the Dai for USDC in Maker's PSM, for a maximum fyDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have called `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.

params.maximumFYDai: Maximum amount of FYDai to borrow.
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.
params.usdcToBorrow: Exact amount of USDC that should be obtained.

borrowUSDCForMaximumFYDaiApprove(address.details: Set proxy approvals for `borrowUSDCForMaximumFYDai` with a given pool.

borrowUSDCForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature(a.details: Borrow fyDai from Controller, sell it immediately for Dai in a pool, and sell the Dai for USDC in Maker's PSM, for a maximum fyDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have called `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.maximumFYDai: Maximum amount of FYDai to borrow.
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.
params.usdcToBorrow: Exact amount of USDC that should be obtained.

relay(uint8,address).details: Workaround to emit events from the USDCProxy contract when being executed through a dsProxy delegate call.

repayAllEarly(address,bytes32,uint256,ad.details: Repay all debt in Controller using for a maximum amount of USDC, reverting if surpassed. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayAllWithFYDaiWithSignature`. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayAllWithFYDaiWithSignature`.

params.maxUSDCIn: Maximum amount of USDC that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.

repayAllEarlyWithSignature(address,bytes.details: Repay all debt in Controller using for a maximum amount of USDC, reverting if surpassed.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.maxUSDCIn: Maximum amount of USDC that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.
params.usdcSig: packed signature for permit of USDC transfers to this proxy. Ignored if '0x'.

repayAllMature(bytes32,uint256,address).details: Repay all debt for an user and series in Controller using USDC. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayAllWithFYDaiWithSignature`. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayAllWithFYDaiWithSignature`.

params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.

returns._0: Amount of USDC that was taken from the user for the repayment.

repayAllMatureWithSignature(bytes32,uint.details: Repay all debt for an user in Controller for a mature series using Maker's PSM.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.
params.usdcSig: packed signature for permit of USDC transfers to this proxy. Ignored if '0x'.

repayDebtEarly(address,bytes32,uint256,a.details: Repay an amount of fyDai debt in Controller using a given amount of USDC exchanged Dai in Maker's PSM, and then for fyDai at pool rates, with a minimum of fyDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. If `repaymentInUSDC` exceeds the existing debt, the surplus will be locked in the proxy.

params.minFYDaiRepayment: Minimum amount of fyDai debt to repay.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.
params.usdcRepayment: Exact amount of USDC that should be spent on the repayment.

repayDebtEarlyApprove(address).details: Set proxy approvals for `repayDebtEarly` with a given pool.

repayDebtEarlyWithSignature(address,byte.details: Repay an amount of fyDai debt in Controller using a given amount of USDC exchanged Dai in Maker's PSM, and then for fyDai at pool rates, with a minimum of fyDai debt required to be paid. If `repaymentInDai` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary Dai will be used.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.fyDaiDebt: Amount of fyDai debt to repay.
params.repaymentInUSDC: Exact amount of USDC that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.
params.usdcSig: packed signature for permit of USDC transfers to this proxy. Ignored if '0x'.

repayDebtMature(bytes32,uint256,address,.details: Repay an exact amount of Dai-denominated debt in Controller using USDC. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayAllWithFYDaiWithSignature`. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayAllWithFYDaiWithSignature`.

params.daiRepayment: Amount of Dai that should be bought from the PSM for the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.

returns._0: Amount of USDC that was taken from the user for the repayment.

repayDebtMatureWithSignature(bytes32,uin.details: Repay an amount of fyDai debt in Controller using a given amount of USDC exchanged Dai in Maker's PSM. If the amount of Dai obtained by selling USDC exceeds the existing debt, the surplus will be locked in the proxy.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.repaymentInUSDC: Exact amount of USDC that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.
params.usdcSig: packed signature for permit of USDC transfers to this proxy. Ignored if '0x'.

tin().details: Return PSM's tin, so the frontend needs to do one less call.

tout().details: Return PSM's tout, so the frontend needs to do one less call.
